mapper.sql: id, gen_oid, event_no, event_type_info_id, oid, status, creat_time
mapper.insert: insert into sds_event_person_record (id, gen_oid, event_no, event_type_info_id, oid, status, creat_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{genOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventTypeInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sds_event_person_record
id,
gen_oid,
event_no,
event_type_info_id,
oid,
status,
creat_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update sds_event_person_record
gen_oid = #{genOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_no = #{eventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_type_info_id = #{eventTypeInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sds_event_person_record set gen_oid = #{genOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_no = #{eventNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_type_info_id = #{eventTypeInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.event_no eventNo, a.event_type_info_id eventType, a.status status, b.event_name eventName, a.creat_time creatTime, a.gen_oid genOid from (select * from sds_event_person_record where oid = #{oid}) a,sds_event_type_info b WHERE a.event_type_info_id = b.id

select
from sds_event_person_record where gen_oid = #{genOid} and event_type_info_id = #{eventTypeInfoId} order by id desc limit 0,1
